EmailTemplate.subject: NCS – Important Timetable Change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS – Important Timetable Change Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Due to unforeseen circumstances we have had to change the location of the meeting point for your first day of NCS.
Your new meeting point is The Osmani Trust, 58 Underwood Road, E1 5AW.
Please click here to see your updated timetable: https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/assets/Tower_Hamlets_C_Su_11_TT.pdf
We're really sorry if this has caused any inconvenience. Please do get in touch with us on the details below if you have any questions.
We look forward to seeing you on NCS!
Yours sincerely, The NCS Team – The Challenge
Phone: 0203 542 2400 Email: contact@ncsthechallenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 9am - 3pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
